content: row 2 k5 k2tog k51 k2tog k5 63 sts double moss stitch pieces so that the stitch markers row 3 through 6 knit meet using tail thread from co mattress stitch from row 7 k5 k2tog k to last 7 sts k2tog k5 61 sts co row to stitch-marked row do the same for the row 8 through 10 knit bobble end of scarf to close the bottom of the pockets lay repeat row 7-10 14 times more 33 sts flat so that the seam you just created is in the center of begin garter stitch body the pocket stitch across bottom edge to join palm and knit all row until piece measures approx 50 long knuckle sides of pocket weave in all ends block lightly begin increases row 1 k5 m1r k23 m1l k5 35 sts row 2 though 4 knit row 5 k5 m1r k to last 5 sts m1l k5 37 sts repeat row 2-5 14 times 65 sts all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 11/24/20 © fairmount fibers ltd 2013 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
